command.tellProblems: CodeHelper: Tell the problems of the code
setting.apiKey: Defines what api key should this plugin use to communicate with OpenAI.(Reload required)
setting.apiBaseUrl: Defines what base url should this plugin use to communicate with OpenAI.(Reload required)
setting.withLineNumber: Defines whether the plugin should tell the line number of the code.
setting.language: Defines what language should ChatGPT use for reply.
setting.timeout: Defines the timeout of each API request.(ms)
